code: @Lazy @Bean @Scope(ConfigurableBeanFactory.SCOPE_SINGLETON) @ConditionalOnMissingBean(ConsulHealthCheckRepository.class) public HealthCheckRepository consulRepository() throws Exception {     return new ConsulHealthCheckRepository.Builder().configuration(configuration.asHealthCheckConfiguration()).checks(configuration.getChecks()).configurations(configuration.getConfigurations() != null ? configuration.getConfigurations().entrySet().stream().collect(Collectors.toMap(Map.Entry::getKey, e -> e.getValue().asHealthCheckConfiguration())) : Collections.emptyMap()).build(). }
